thread.title: Safe place to stay; good location and staff
thread.title_full: Safe place to stay; good location and staff - Review of Hotel de l'Europe, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Little_Suzy_M
title: Safe place to stay; good location and staff
text:
It was a very good stay with all the things I needed--- clean room, good bed,free wifi, tv, clean private toilet/ bathroom with toiletries, a fan, kettle, free breakfast with complimentary tea:teapot/coffee aside from the fruit juice provided. HELPFUL and FRIENDLY staff; free Paris map with attractions.
The best part is the location:
* 5 min. walking distance to Gare du Nord or Gare de l'est
* bus stop infront of the hotel ( bus 30) that goes straight to Trocadero for the best view of Eiffel Tower; this same bus passes attractions like : Sacre de Couer, Moulin Rouge ; Arc de Triomphe . You can stop at Charles de gaulle etoile and walk through Champs Elysees .
* next block is bus stop for bus 38 that goes to Notre Dame Cathedral and nearby Louvre
Will DEFINITELY stay again once back in Paris.
Tip: * there is a Western Union outlet at the corner of the street and this shld be your landmark; hotel is the 2nd door from Western Union with a hanging signage that reads : HE
* nearby laverie in case you need to do your laundry with coin operated machines and detergent vending machine.
* there is a Monop grocery opposite (outside) Gare de l'est where you can get bottled water 1.5L for just â‚¬1.00 ( big savings ) and for your snacks / refreshments
